                    Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬  Ã¢â€“â‚¬    Ã¢â€“â‚¬   Ã¢â€“â‚¬ Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬ Ã¢â€“â‚¬ Ã¢â€“â‚¬    Ã¢â€“â‚¬     Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬   Ã¢â€“â‚¬Ã¢â€“â‚¬
  
  NOTE: This addon release is all-inclusive and includes all previous updates
  and DLCs. The previously unreleased DLCs 'Perfect Patio Stuff' and
  'Cool Kitchen Stuff' have been included as a bonus.
  
  --
  
  The Sims 4 Spa Day provides an all new type of venue, the Spa, where Sims 
  can get a relaxing massage or hang out in the sauna. This pack features 
  several interactive objects, including a new massage chair and the mud bath! 
  Sims can also wind down from their daily stress by building their Wellness 
  skill; taking yoga classes and learning how to meditate can build this skill. 
  The higher their Wellness skill, the more Yoga poses they will be able to do,  
  and the better massages they will be able to give.

  2. Burn or mount the image.
